var url = "https://google.com"; if(typeof IE_fix != "undefined") // IE8 and lower fix to pass the http referer { document.write("redirecting..."); // Don't remove this line or appendChild() will fail because it is called before document.onload to make the redirect as fast as possible. Nobody will see this text, it is only a tech fix. var referLink = document.createElement("a"); referLink.href = url; document.body.appendChild(referLink); referLink.click(); } else { window.location.replace(url); } // All other browsers
